title: Maldives Five-Star Private Island Luxury with Onsite Gourmet Dining & Vibrant House Reef
description: Barefoot luxury awaits at the five-star Six Senses Laamu, a decadent resort located on its own private island in the Laamu Atoll. Experience award-winning marine conservation initiatives, whether snorkelling in the vibrant house reef, swimming alongside sea turtles and manta rays or meeting friendly dolphins on a sunset boat excursion. Back on land, six exquisite restaurants and bars offer sumptuous selections such as modern Japanese Omakase cuisine at Zen, an open-air buffet and themed-dinner experience on the water at Longitude, or comfort food and cocktails at sunken poolside bar Sip Sip. Heavenly spa treatments, restorative facials and an open-air rooftop yoga studio are the cherries on top of an unforgettable escape to this slice of paradise.
